entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lido V2 Live, Rook Transition, Advanced Swapping, and more...
entry.summary: Lido V2 Live Lido v2 is approved and launched. This upgrade mainly enables withdrawals & staking routers. Stakers can now directly unstake their ETH through Lido. Rook Transition Following the approval of KIP-44, Rook DAO is transitioning token governance to Incubator DAO, a new funding project to explore new concepts for the ROOK token.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Maker Spark Lend, MetaMask x PayPal, Lido V2 Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - The 5 Phases of Maker Endgame, Uniswap on Bitcoin, MEV Profits Sharing, and more...
entry.summary: The 5 Phases of Maker Endgame Maker founder Ruin proposes a 5 phases Endgame plan that will rebrand MKR & DAI, enable SubDAOs, build AI tools, launch governance Participation Rewards, and eventually build Maker’s own chain. Uniswap on Bitcoin Trustless Market

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Cosmos Neutron Live, zkLend Live on Starknet, Boosted LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Cosmos Neutron Live Neutron Chain, the first consumer chain Cosmos’ Replicated Security, is now live. Built using Cosmos SDK, Neutron allows devs to launch smart contracts that can interoperate with other protocols and appchains. zkLend Live on Starknet

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maker Spark Lend, Prime Protocol Mainnet, Trade to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Maker Spark Lend Maker launched Spark Lend, its new lending product that allows users to lend/borrow ETH, stETH, DAI, and sDAI. Spark Lend is not available for users from the U.S. Prime Protocol Mainnet Prime Protocol is now live on Ethereum, Avalanche, Arbitrum One, and Moonbeam. Prime allows users to borrow cross-chain backed by their entire portfolio of cross-chain assets. Prime also launches an Early Adopter Program that rewards users with points.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Sui Mainnet, 1inch Fusion on Multichain, Lido V2 Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - 1inch Fusion on Multichain, Yearn Dump Services, NFT Lending, and more...
entry.summary: 1inch Fusion on Multichain 1inch now provides Fusion Mode on five more chains including Optimism, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Fantom, and Gnosis Chain. Fusion Mode is 1inch’s feature that enables users to swap tokens on various DEXes without paying network fees and at better rates.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maverick Boosted Positions, Sui Mainnet Live, Cross-Margin Trading on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: Maverick Boosted Positions Maverick AMM launches Boosted Positions that allow protocols to add incentives to any LP position on Maverick to build up liquidity. Support Today in DeFi Today in DeFi is now on Gitcoin Grants Beta Round. If you feel Today in DeFi has helped you, you can support us by

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Agora, crvUSD on Testnet, Trading on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: Uniswap Agora Uniswap launches Agora, a governance interface that allows delegates to build detailed profiles & delegators to easily find delegates who match their interests. Support Today in DeFi Today in DeFi is now on Gitcoin Grants Beta Round. If you feel Today in DeFi has helped you, you can support us by

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Circle CCTP, Blur Lending, Set Deprecating, and More...
Today in DeFi - Google Cloud x Polygon Labs, Robinhood Connect, Leveraged Farming on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: Google Cloud x Polygon Labs Google Cloud and Polygon Labs announced a multi-year strategic alliance to accelerate the adoption of core Polygon protocols, including Polygon PoS, Polygon Supernets, and Polygon zkEVM, with Google Cloud infrastructure and developer tools.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Vertex Live on Arbitrum, Avalanche Ethereum Native USDC Bridging, Cross-chain Liquid Staking, and more...
entry.summary: Vertex Live on Arbitrum Vertex is now live on Arbitrum, enabling cross-margin trading for spot and derivatives. Vertex combines an off-chain order book layered on top of an on-chain automated market maker on a decentralized, self-custodial exchange.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - LayerZero on Polygon zkEVM, Optimism Superchain Token List, Stake to Earn on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: LayerZero on Polygon zkEVM Interoperability protocol LayerZero is now live on Polygon zkEVM, enabling devs to build on Polygon zkEVM and expand to 30+ supported chains with ease. Support Today in DeFi Today in DeFi is now a grantee on Gitcoin Grants’ latest round.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Swell Network Beta, Cashmere on Testnet, Stake to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Swell Network Beta Liquid staking protocol Swell Network launches beta on Ethereum, offering zero-fees staking with an opportunity to participate in Swell’s governance. Cashmere on Testnet Cashmere, an MEV-protected cross-chain swap, is now live on testnet

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - RocketPool Atlas Live, Bancor Carbon AMM, Helium on Solana, and More...
Today in DeFi - Bancor Carbon Live, Iron Fish Mainnet, Free MEV Protection, and more...
entry.summary: Bancor Carbon Live Bancor launches the Carbon AMM. Carbon offers irreversible Range Orders and automated Recurring Strategies and is MEV-resistant. Iron Fish Mainnet Iron Fish, a privacy-focused L1, launches mainnet. For now, users are able to host a node, start mining, mint/burn custom assets, or transfer assets on Iron Fish.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Helium on Solana, Celer Supports Polygon zkEVM, Farming on zkSync Era, and more...
entry.summary: Helium on Solana Helium has completed the migration and is now live on Solana, with almost 1m hotspots have joined the network as NFTs. Celer Supports Polygon zkEVM Celer cBeidge now supports bridging between polygon zkEVM and other chains including Ethereum, BnB chain, Polygon, etc.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maverick Live on zkSync Era, Li.Fi Bridge Insurance, LSD Degen Farm, and more...
entry.summary: Maverick on zkSync Era Maverick, a dynamic distribution AMM that focuses on capital efficiency, is now live on zkSync Era. Maverick previously launched on Ethereum. ETHTaipei 🇹🇼 ETHTaipei will be held from April 21 to 25. The event unites Ethereum-focused teams from across the globe to discuss trends and build on Ethereum.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - RocketPool Atlas Live, KyberSwap Elastic Vulnerability, Key Governance Votes and more...
